snippet: The Steelers receiver Hines Ward, the team’s career leader in receptions, receiving yards and receiving touchdowns, will be released after being with the team for 14 years.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers announces that revered receiver Hines Ward--team's career leader in receptions, receiving yards and receiving touchdowns--will be released after 14 years with the team.
lead_paragraph: The Steelers receiver Hines Ward, the team’s career leader in receptions, receiving yards and receiving touchdowns, will be released after being with the team for 14 years.

headline.main: Pittsburgh Cuts Loose a Revered Receiver
headline.print_headline: After 14 Years, Steelers Will Cut a Revered Receiver
